# SOS-FISK    

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->
This repository includes the development package smsRdevel to estimate natural mortalities for the SOS-FISK and MERTOR project

## Installation

You can install the development version of smsR as

``` {r, eval= FALSE}
remotes::install_github("https://github.com/nissandjac/SOS-FISK", dependencies = TRUE)
```
